extendedInfo.description: Start planning your garden now! This app assists in planning and tracking of square foot gardens, patio container gardens, seedlings, staging , and raised garden beds.  When creating a new bed the dimensions can be selected-- ranging from 1 by 1 to 4 by 8 square foot plots. Details of every plot can be saved along with a journal entry/task tracker.  This is a valuable tool for creating successful gardens by learning from past success and mistakes. Please contact developer with any errors or bugs.  Thanks! @GardenSquared

reviews.title: Nice idea
reviews.comment: It\'s a good idea but when I make a 4x8 bed I can only see 5 & 1/2 rows 7 & 8 are cut out completely. If this gets fixed I\'ll try using it more and rate again.
reviews.author: Aaron Rice

reviews.title: Great app for tracking garden
reviews.comment: My garden is 4x8 so it fits the largest option. This is my first year gardening and this gives me a super convienant place to keep all my plans and records. I love this app and it helps me feel like pro gardener.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good idea but not flexible enough
reviews.comment: Thanks for the app. Only around 7 letters show in the white circles. Can\'t change layout. History of changes over year? Agree with the comments for improvement. Then it would be fantastic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like :)
reviews.comment: Would be better w/more pictures to place in garden (variety of Vegs ... potatoes, berries, fruit trees etc... and be able to change color ... Onions purple = red onion yellow = yellow onion) also bigger font for label on garden screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If you could take a picture of your plant and ahad few more enhancements would be a great app. keep working on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No backup??
reviews.comment: This app served my purposes well enough.  It is a little backwards in that each time I open it, I have to go in and make the labels visible.  Worse than the limited user-friendliness, however,  is that I have upgraded to a new phone and have discovered that the app saves no memory of my garden bed information from my previous phone. With 72 total square feet of garden space,  I\'m a little miffed about this and will now Seek a different app that allows data backup.
reviews.author: Rebecca Ann

reviews.title: Fair
reviews.comment: It could use a lot of features. I used Garden Tracker on my iPod touch and that\'s a lot closer to what I\'d be looking for in this type of app.  A few suggestions:  A plant database. It should include fields for plant category (vegetable, flower, herb), planting requirements (time, distance, depth), harvesting requirements and results, sun, etc.  Ability to add/edit/delete multiple plants at the same time, not just copy/paste one at a time. Very tiresome to add the same plant 8 times.  I\'m out of room...

reviews.title: Not useful
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show enough plant options, no details on planting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More veggies pls and printable too
reviews.comment: Love this but like more pics, bigger beds, and let me print it out! Thanks u!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: I haven\'t used this app  very long but so far seems to be very useful. Easy to use. Only thing I would change is to make it so you can transfer data from one section to the next. That would make it so you wouldn\'t have to type the same info over again with more than one of same plant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Just what I needed to track my Square Foot Garden. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing things but works well
reviews.comment: I like it enough to keep and hope that author adds more plants .. onions, potatoes, etc. The ability to delete beds would help. Has spots with 4 and 16. Spots with 2 and 9 would be good. Other than that, it is great for those square foot gardeners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It needs to let you make the garden whatever size you want. Mine is 5x5 and i can\'t log it here. Change please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Garden Layout
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure what use it is to have a list of garden beds but not be able to view the whole layout of the garden. Not what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not much variety. Berry plants arent included! Strawberries should be added, and more herbs and veggies.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works awesome. Add more vegatables please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sq Foot Technique
reviews.comment: Some folks miss  the concept that sq ft gardens are designed to reach into the center from the side so that you do not walk on soil, thus 4 ft wide.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 4x12
reviews.comment: Missing a 4 x 12, and a list of plants wouldn\'t hurt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I have 8 beds and they are 4x16 so this app does not work for me.
reviews.comment: Please Updateto expand the beds, and add pictures please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very impressive
reviews.comment: Not a bad idea, but this pretty primitive.
reviews.author: A Google User
